about_the_game:
If you enjoy Stellar Tactics and you want to contribute to the ongoing development of the game, this pack provides bonus content and a new ship - the Aarman KD4. You will receive:

  • The Aarman KD4.
  • Two full sized digital poster illustrations.
  • Ten 3D printer models of various ships found in the game (in STL format). Requires a 3D printer.
  • High resolution crew portraits found in the game.
  • Bonus story illustrations.
  • My eternal thanks.



The Aarman KD4: A unique ship that cannot be found elsewhere in the game Universe. This ship will be located in ship storage on the Achmedius Trade Port after downloading the DLC pack. This applies to current saves and is also available for each new play through as soon as you arrive at the trade port. You can purchase FTL drives for the Aarman KD4 at the trade port after completing Phestus' FTL mission.

The Aarman KD4 is ideal for launching a mining and trading career and is classified as a Light Merchant vessel. It comes equipped with two mining lasers, a heavy laser turret and a Gauss cannon. Equipment for this ship can be purchased at any Ship Merchant. All equipment can be upgraded, looted and crafted similar to other ships in the game.

Ship specs:
Cargo Storage - 11,000
Turret 1 - Light turret - Mining Laser
Turret 2 - Light turret - Mining Laser
Turret 3 - Heavy/Light turret - Heavy Laser
Turret 4 - Light turret - Gauss Cannon
All basic systems less the FTL drive.
